short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment to web. talkn can share comments with users watching the same web page. Please enjoy the world of talkn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
●You can

1. Comment to web.
　　∟No login communication.
2. View web data.
　　∟Ogp & meta & media & analyze data.
3. Linkt to web.
　　∟SNS, iOS, Android, Talkn portal.
4. Share to web.
　　∟Please write ‘<iframe />’ in your site.
